title: The Kid
description: Powerful businessman Russ Duritz is self-absorbed and immersed in his work. But by the magic of the moon, he meets Rusty, a chubby, charming 8-year-old version of himself who can't believe he could turn out so badly – with no life and no dog. With Rusty's help, Russ is able to reconcile the person he used to dream of being with the man he's actually become.

reviews.text: This is a wonderful family movie with a lot of funny and warm moments.    Bruce Willis and Spencer Breslin were fantastic.
I love this movie. It has touching moments and a great message for all of us that reminds us to keep alive the kid we all have inside.
